name: Date Catastrophe
description:
An alien girl  disguised as a human is looking for love but doesn't have a great understanding of how it works. She has a date coming up soon so she calls up her best friend to help her out since they've been studying human relationships for a long time, But unfortunately for her they've been studying it from cringy romance manga.

_____________________________________________________________________________________________

Controls:  Mouse and or The enter button

______________________________________________________________________________________

This game features Two endings had to scrap one of them because of bugs. But hope you enjoy anyway!
